nodes.text: Obulette shipyards or Obulette dockyards were a starship repair facility in orbit around the planet Obulette in the Tapani sector. Obulette was the capital world of House Mecetti.

The shipyards were open to all except House Melantha and House Pelagia vessels who were strictly forbidden from using the facility. All other house affiliations were welcome, but the prices depended on political favor. These shipyards were an alternative to the shipyards at Tallaan. Another major shipyard in the Tapani sector was the Fondor Shipyards in the Freeworlds Territory.
